code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[countries,setCountries]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchCountries=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);setError(null);const response=await fetch("https://xcountries-backend.azurewebsites.net/all");if(!response.ok){throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${response.status}`);}const data=await response.json();setCountries(data);}catch(e){console.error("Error fetching data: ",e);setError("Failed to fetch countries.
